entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The Company is the entity establishing and managing the Plan, and responsible for delivering shares of Common Stock or other consideration pursuant to the Award.

entities.name: SERVICE RECIPIENT
entities.description: The Service Recipient is the entity that, along with the Company, may withhold or account for Tax-Related Items and deliver shares of Common Stock or other consideration pursuant to the Award.

entities.name: TAX AUTHORITY
entities.description: The tax authority is the entity to which Tax-Related Items may need to be paid directly by the individual, Company, or Service Recipient.

relationships.relationship_description: The Company and the Service Recipient collaborate on withholding or accounting for Tax-Related Items and delivering shares of Common Stock or other consideration pursuant to the Award.
The Company may need to interact with the tax authority to ensure proper withholding and payment of Tax-Related Items.
The Service Recipient may need to interact with the tax authority to ensure proper withholding and payment of Tax-Related Items.
